entry.title: Beekeepers fighting uphill battle to protect the reputation of NZ honey

media:group.media:title: Beekeepers fighting uphill battle to protect the reputation of NZ honey
media:group.media:description:
The controversial weed killer glyphosate has been found in more than 20 per cent of product but stopping bees picking up traces of the chemical is almost impossible.
